title: Harry S Truman National Historic Site: News
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     News             News       Harry S Truman National Historic Site strives to keep the public informed about news events which occur within the park by providing press releases to local and regional news providers, and by posting current news releases on this web site.  Â     Harry S. Truman holding up the newspaper "Dewey Defeats Truman" Truman Library
